blocks.text: Hacktivists are individuals or groups who attack systems to promote political, social, or ideological causes rather than financial gain.
Their operations often focus on public visibility, website defacement, data leaks, or denial-of-service attacks intended to embarrass or disrupt organizations.
Hacktivist campaigns are usually short-lived but can generate significant public attention.
Targets are selected based on perceived wrongdoing or symbolic value rather than technical vulnerability alone.
